title: Mordekaiser Es Numbero Uno
body:
He's Baaaaaaaack!

{{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} 

http://euw.op.gg/champion/mordekaiser/statistics/top

Edit: Not even joking, he's the number 1 winrate top laner globally, tried him for myself, he absolutely Dumpsters ADC's.

replies.body:
So em.. you think a 0.6% pick rate is a good sample size? 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

morde's stats do not matter

they're irrelevant everytime due to the sample

What is Numbero?
Ahhhh you mean “número”

1% of all players play Morde 
1% of that 1% play Morde bot consistently.   Cant really  come up with analytics on such a  small sample size. How many of those matches were determined via opponent ignorance. Or LVL 1 cheese
Same way how if you look in the right places, you will find an incredibly high winrate for him as ADC, not many play him, however those that still do are REALLY good at him
He was never gone, he's always been the more stable in meta darius.
b R a Z i L 1 ? /  ?
